resources.string:
Next feature release:
 · New: Downloadable pocket queries can be imported directly
 · New: Improved Done and Cancel buttons for coordinate input
 · New: Change geocaching platform quickly by clicking info on main screen
 · New: Show amount of people watching a cache listing
 · New: Filter for multi platform listings with different found state
 · New: Parse GPX files of Geocaching.su
 · New: Support opencaching links using their internal ID
 · New: Russian translation
 · New: Show names of contacts if more than one match found
 · New: Suggest to remove list if empty
 · New: Allow to add past events
 · New: "My finds" pocket query is shown (if available)
 · Fix: Avoid crash when loading caches from different sources
 · Fix: Update found status in list after one-click-offline-log
 · Removed: Swaggie trackables support has been removed as they are deprecated
